data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Soest, Rob van, Carballo, Jose Luis, Hooper, John (2012): Polyaxone monaxonids: revision of raspailiid sponges with polyactine megascleres (Cyamon and Trikentrion). ZooKeys 239: 1-70, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.239.3734, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.239.3734
